These shoes were comfortable right out of the box. Also, next to my more expensive loafers, they look just as good. So, great value for the price.

This is a beautiful shoe. It fits well and is true to size. The reason for the low rating is one of the shoes squeaks. I have tried everything to fix it. I will continue to wear but probably not as much as I would if no noise.

Absolutely fake leather. Doesn't breathe or sculpt to foot, plastic feeling and terrible for warm weather. It seems there is a thin layer of real leather on the inside of the top, as well as the fringe (but not the cord). This really helps so that the top of the shoe doesn't rub your foot. But the edges rub, and the bottom of the shoe sticks to your foot like plastic. That being said, they are made in a wonderful shape - very wonderful fit for the foot. However, this simply is not worth the money. I've worn it twice and the fake leather is wrinkled and scraped with scuffs that are a lighter brown color.
I had to wait a long time for them, but I'm still glad I ordered these.  They feel very comfortable, the size is a perfect 8 which is what I wear.  I love them.

Don't let me get started on these shoes ooh my gosh they are so comfortable I thought I would have to break them in but noooo they were perfect I went and got the black an well love them

These shoes have seamlessly integrated themselves into my work wardrobe, and I can't help but give them a resounding 5 out of 5 stars.  From the very first time I slipped them on, I knew I had found something special. The chunky leather design exudes both style and professionalism, making them the perfect addition to my business casual attire. The platform lug sole not only adds a touch of sophistication but also provides exceptional comfort that lasts all day long.  I find myself wearing these loafers so often to work because they strike the ideal balance between fashion and function. The chunky design and quality leather give off a polished and put-together look that's perfect for the office environment. What's more, the platform sole not only elevates my height but also cushions my feet, allowing me to move around comfortably and confidently throughout the day.  Whether I'm rushing between meetings or spending hours at my desk, these loafers provide the support and comfort I need. Their versatile nature allows me to pair them with various outfits, making them a go-to choice no matter what I'm wearing.  I appreciate the attention to detail that ADAMUMU has put into these loafers. The craftsmanship is evident in every aspect, from the quality of the leather to the precision of the stitching. These shoes are a true testament to their commitment to providing women with footwear that is both stylish and practical.

I'm loving these shoes! They are excellently crafted with high-quality material, and the tassel detail is my favorite. The color is perfect for a brown loafer, and I appreciate that they are not overly masculine, making them ideal for work. The only minor drawback is that they're a tad tight in the toe box, but overall, these shoes are fantastic!
These shows are so comfortable, perfect for work and they look incredibly professional. The pictures don’t do them justice in my opinion.

These are going to be one of my favourite pair of shoes. The leather is stunning, they are SUPER comfortable and the price can't be beat. Sometimes I have difficulty purchasing flat shoes due to a skinny heel and high arches. I bought an 8, probably could have got a 7 1/2 but I'll put an insert in if they stretch too much. I might buy the black ones too...
I tried them on inside and  I love  the style and quality of this loafer. They are exactly as mentioned . I gave only 4 stars because I have not yet worn them out.
